timeline.bodyText: There seems to be unnecessary spacing before every line in this file
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: I'd prefer it if we had blank newlines at the end of files. It prevents some issues that can arise in git.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: This method should be called getLocationByUuid
timeline.author: ibacher
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+

+package org.openmrs.module.fhir2.api.dao;
+
+import org.openmrs.Location;
+
+import javax.validation.constraints.NotNull;
+
+public interface FhirLocationDao {
+
+    Location getLocationByuuid(@NotNull String uuid);

timeline.bodyText: Could you add some tests for the corresponding toOpenmrsType() method since that appears to also be implemented in this PR.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Add another assertion to check if returns location with correct uuid
timeline.author: corneliouzbett
